original_text: When Elijah heard that, he covered his face with his robe. He went out and he stood at the entrance of the cave. Then a voice said to him, ‘Elijah, why have you come here?’
korean_text: 엘리야가 듣고 겉옷으로 얼굴을 가리고 나가 굴 어귀에 서매 소리가 그에게 임하여 이르시되 엘리야야 네가 어찌하여 여기 있느냐

sentences.original_text: he covered his face with his robe
and he stood at the entrance of the cave
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 굴 입구에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: Then a voice said to him
Elijah, why have you come here?
